DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Shadow card, another random Shadow card in your hand has its actions triggered at half effectiveness, then is discarded.
A card is Shadowplayed if its actions are triggered by Shadow.
A card with Progressive can be permanently Upgraded by fulfilling the Progressive condition.
A separate HP type that goes away at the end of combat.
Strangled creatures take damage equal to their Strangle count whenever an Attack is played.

PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
When you reach #b5 or more Outburst, trigger an explosion that deals #b25 damage to ALL enemies, then remove your Outburst.

Whenever an enemy with Due dies, gain #yStrength and #yDexterity equal to the amount of Due the enemy had, then transfer remaining Due to another enemy. Due is reduced by #b1 at the start of your turn.
